faq: How to use the Encounter any Pokemon cheats (v1.0.1)

turn the cheats On:

[Encounter Mod]
04000000 00D0A610 148DABBC
04000000 03075500 18000181
04000000 03075504 790063E1
04000000 03075508 18000161
04000000 0307550C 790067E1
04000000 03075510 18000141
04000000 03075514 79006BE1
04000000 03075518 18000121
04000000 0307551C 3900DBE1
04000000 03075520 39402288
04000000 03075524 1772543C
04000000 03075530 00000085
04000000 03075534 00000000
04000000 03075538 00000000
04000000 0307553C 00000001


Choose any of the following codes you want (You will need to edit your cheat file to customize these codes):
[Encounter Pokemon "Name"(Choose 1 cheat only)]
08000000 03075530 00000000 0000XXXX
Example:

[Encounter Pokemon 6# Charizard]
08000000 03075530 00000000 00000006
or
[Encounter Pokemon 25# Pikachu]
08000000 03075530 00000000 00000019

 
you can keep switching the cheat for another Pokemon Encounter
do not forget to Turn cheat off and use Default Encounter cheat, or just reset Game after you are done
here is a complete PokeDex Encounter Compiled By @JoeriPLA

---
